_meta.session: Hotfix Correction: Magic Number & Purity Follow-up
_meta.author: Antigravity

jules_hotfix_correction.title: Hotfix_Correction_Magic_Numbers
jules_hotfix_correction.instruction:
PR Review result: REQUEST_CHANGES. Fix the following:
1. [ai_driven_household_engine.py:L356]: Replace hardcoded mortgage rate 0.05 with `self.config_module.DEFAULT_MORTGAGE_RATE`. 
2. Update the config module to include this default value.
3. Ensure tests reflect this change and don't rely on magic numbers.
4. Verify that all 'markets' or 'housing_market' references use context.market_snapshot or context.markets correctly.
